---
title: "UMNGreenhouse"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
thepage = readLines('http://www.d.umn.edu/biology/affiliatedResources/greenhouse/inventory/view.html')

```


```{r}
grep('Genus/Species', thepage)
```



```{r}
thepage[127:140]
```

```{r}
goodlines = '<td><input type="Submit" name=([^<]*) class="button"'
try = grep(goodlines, thepage, value=TRUE)

```



```{r}
try[127:900]
````






```{r}
getexpr = function(s,g)substring(s,g,g+attr(g,'match.length')-1)
gg = gregexpr(goodlines,try)
matches = mapply(getexpr, try, gg)
result = gsub( goodlines,'\\1',matches)
names(result) = NULL
```



```{r}
UNMgreenhouse = as.data.frame(matrix(result, ncol = 1,byrow=TRUE))
names(UNMgreenhouse) = c('Genus species')
head(UNMgreenhouse)
```
